name: Football Girls: Dream Team
description: There are two categories of people: some of them love football more than girls and some love girls more than football. But you don't even have to choose: in Football Girls: Dream Team you can find both beautiful girls and charming football atmosphere!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 380 MB available space
